title: Bengaluru News Highlights: Amid Hijab row, VP Naidu says students should be guided by school uniform - The Indian Express
content:
1. Bengaluru News Highlights: Amid Hijab row, VP Naidu says students should be guided by school uniform  The Indian Express

description: Bangalore News Today Updates, Karnataka Hijab Controversy Highlights, Bengaluru, Karnataka News Highlights, 26 Feb: Bommai says his govt will provide all help to students arriving from Ukraine reach their homes in various parts of the state after landing in Mumbai and Delhi
